name: Crystal's Castle
storyline: The evil sorceress Morgana has appropriated the Mystical Castle of Crystal. The good people are no longer able to use magic! But young sorceress, a descendant of Crystal, along with her faerie companion Pixie set out to eject Morgana from her throne to restore magic to everyone again. Run thru 7 stages, finding magical tomes of elemental magic in this retro style platformer loaded with easter eggs to older games from the 1990's. Unlock a boss rush mode and god mode.
